blocks.caption: Figure 116: Shape of the chain under load
blocks.description: The figure illustrates a chain suspended between two points, showing the angles of tension and the arc it forms under the influence of its own weight. The forces acting on the chain, including tension $T_1$ and $T_2$, are depicted.

blocks.text: Draw the triangle of forces for the three forces $T_1$ and $T_2$. Let it be assumed that $T_e$ (the horizontal tension) = $c$ if we compare.
